channel.title: Help help help!
channel.description:
Kay im using a client that needs the cache to be in your c: drive or whatever and i need some assistance
How do i make it so that the cache will automaticly download to the correct place like whne you use winrar you have to do it manuly and theres always that flamer that complanes about having to do all the work. i have never used mysql before so if thats a way to do it pass me some tutorials lol i need some help thanks :)
